scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Lamentation of Christ, with the body of Jesus, bearing wounds from crucifixion, cradled by the Virgin Mary. He is dressed in a white loincloth. Surrounding them are several grieving figures, including women with veiled heads and one woman in a red robe holding a chalice. A wooden cross stands prominently behind the figures. The setting is a grassy, outdoor landscape under a blue sky.
